message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value. While I cannot disclose the exact nature of the product at this time, I assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a price that reflects the product's potential and allows for a mutually beneficial agreement.  I understand this is a significant investment, so please feel free to ask any questions you may have. I'm confident you'll see the value in this opportunity.
